pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connect to the 'nettskjema.no' API of the University of Oslo // Enables users to retrieve data, meta-data, and codebooks from https://nettskjema.no/. The data from the API is richer than from the online data portal. This package is not developed by the University of Oslo IT. Mowinckel (2021) doi:10.5281/zenodo.4745481.
